au.cost: Free for Channel 7, Varies for Foxtel packages, AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports
au.restrictions: Channel 7 broadcasts select matches for free, Foxtel/Kayo show all matches
au.additionalInfo: Channel 7 has free-to-air rights, while Foxtel/Kayo have rights to all matches including exclusive games

nz.cost: Varies based on Sky Sport package
nz.additionalInfo: Sky Sport holds rights to broadcast BBL matches in New Zealand

gb.cost: Varies based on BT Sport package
gb.additionalInfo: BT Sport holds rights to broadcast BBL matches in the UK

us.additionalInfo: Willow TV provides both TV and streaming options for BBL matches in the USA

in.additionalInfo: Sony Six holds rights to broadcast BBL matches in India, available through SonyLIV streaming service

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport holds rights to broadcast BBL matches in South Africa and sub-Saharan Africa

ca.additionalInfo: Willow TV provides both TV and streaming options for BBL matches in Canada

pk.additionalInfo: PTV Sports often broadcasts BBL matches on free-to-air TV in Pakistan

bd.additionalInfo: Gazi TV often broadcasts BBL matches in Bangladesh

sg.cost: Varies based on StarHub TV package
sg.additionalInfo: HubSports on StarHub often broadcasts BBL matches in Singapore

global.restrictions: May be geo-blocked in certain regions
global.additionalInfo: The Cricket Australia Live app provides live streaming in some regions without TV deals, subscription may be required
